text: The 2016 Team Speedway Junior World Championship was the 12th FIM Team Under-21 World Championship season. The Final took place on 20 August, 2016 at the ICA Maxi Arena in Norrköping, Sweden. Poland won their 9th Team Under-21 World Championship. The Poles accumulated 44 points, with Bartosz Zmarzlik and Paweł Przedpełski scoring 14 points each, to beat Australia by seven points. ==Semi-Finals== {| width=100% |width=25%| * Holsted * 4 June 2016 * Referee: Giuseppe Grandi {| class=wikitable style="font-size: 95%" !
